Hi, I'm

To'a Heck

Junior Software Engineer / IT Applications Specialist

What I do

Software Development

  • Maintaining and updating web applications to ensure smooth operation and performance.
  • Developing mobile apps for iOS and Android with intuitive interfaces and seamless experiences.
  • Writing Python scripts to automate tasks and solve complex problems efficiently.

IT / Business Applications

  • Managing database operations and implementing security protocols to protect data.
  • Organizing and tracking project tasks using Jira dashboards and tickets.
  • Troubleshooting and resolving technical issues promptly to minimize downtime.

Artwork & Graphic Design

  • Designing advertisements using various visual mediums to attract the target audience.
  • Creating personal artwork in my free time to explore creativity and improve skills.
  • Collaborating with other artists to bring their creative visions to life.

Who I am

Welcome to my portfolio website! I am To'a Heck, a recent grad from California State University, East Bay as of December 2023. I am passionate about computer science and would like to build a dynamic career and make an impact within an innovative technology company. As a software developer, I am looking for a highly collaborative enviroinment where I can contribute my expertise in designing, developing, and executing solutions to enhance the quality of customer experiences.

I would like to explore my full potential as a new graduate by joining a collaborative team to solve cutting-edge problems while exploring and learning new tools, technologies, and the world of business.

Other contributions I would like to make during my career:

  • Cultivate a culture of design and art amongst software engineers by blending the beauty of art and the art of science.
  • Share what I learn along the way to mentor and teach those less experienced than myself
  • Be an advocate for increasing Polynesians in the field of computer science.
